titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the assizes in St. Maries Church in request of George Ashby Esq., High-Sheriff of the said county by Thomas Sawbridge, Vicar of Harstone, July the 25th, 1689.
titleStmt.author: Sawbridge, Thomas, Vicar of Harstone.
